definition: a sharp side formed by the intersection of two surfaces of an object, provide with an edge
details:
noun
- a sharp side formed by the intersection of two surfaces of an object
= example: a sharp side formed by the intersection of two surfaces of an object
- the outside limit of an object or area or surface
- a slight competitive advantage
= example: a slight competitive advantage
- the attribute of urgency in tone of voice
= example: the attribute of urgency in tone of voice
= synonyms: sharpness
- the boundary of a surface
= synonyms: border
- a line determining the limits of an area
= synonyms: bound
verb
- provide with an edge
= example: provide with an edge
- lie adjacent to another or share a boundary
= synonyms: march
- to advance slowly, as if by inches
= example: to advance slowly, as if by inches
= synonyms: inch
- provide with a border or edge
= example: provide with a border or edge
= synonyms: border
